name: Oriza
description:
Tilt and roll through hours of fun, challenging obstacles, that’ll be sure to challenge players.
Oriza is a 3D ball-rolling adventure game where players must race against time and physics through 90 levels ranging from easy - very hard while collecting coins and not falling off the stage.
Each level contains a 60-second timer in which, the player must complete the level before it finishes.
Each level is unlocked by completing the level before it.
Collect coins to add more lives and reduce the chances of getting game over: (30 coins = 1 life).
